name: scramble-game
description: A calm, anxiety-free anagram word puzzle game designed for relaxation and mental wellness
author: Scramble Game Team

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && tsc && vite build
scripts.build:analyze: npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist
scripts.build:size: npm run build && powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path dist -Recurse | Measure-Object -Property Length -Sum | Select-Object @{Name='SizeKB';Expression={[math]::Round($_.Sum/1KB,2)}}"
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test:prod && npm run build:size
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Build completed successfully! Ready for deployment ðŸš€'
